about_the_game:
Turtle Bay Adventure: Restore & Revive the Island!

Step ashore in Turtle Bay, a tropical haven where the rare turtle families, unique to this island, are now in peril. Amidst the chaos, cherished belongings were scattered, and local shops left in disarray. Join Kanoa and Malia on a heartfelt quest to ensure the turtles' safety, recover lost objects, and breathe life back into the community and its businesses.

Key Features:

  • Tropical Hidden Object Gameplay: Embark on a journey through serene landscapes, uncovering lost objects that tell the island's tales.
  • Rejuvenate Local Shops: Join the islanders in their mission to restore cherished shops to their vibrant best.
  • Engaging Puzzles: Piece together the island's history by recovering the scattered map through intriguing puzzles.
  • Save Turtle Families: Embark on a crucial quest to locate the last eggs of unique turtle families exclusive to Turtle Bay.
  • Play Mini-Games: Engage in fun activities, gather coins for essential shopping, and aid the island in its resurgence.
  • Enjoy Tropical Music & Backgrounds: Immerse yourself in the island's ambiance, from sun-kissed beaches to secluded jungle hideaways.

Rebuild, bond, and forge unforgettable memories in this heartwarming adventure. Dive into Turtle Bay and be the ray of hope the island has been waiting for!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

  • Explore deeper into the wilderness with the bonus stage!
  • Test your skills with 30+ additional puzzle levels!
  • Gather coins to unlock a variety of unique collectibles!
  • 3 mini-game modes to earn extra coins!
  • Extensive gallery of beautiful pictures from across the island, Music player and more!

  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM

  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

short_description: Endangered turtles threaten Turtle Bay's legacy. Join Kanoa and Malia to rescue these creatures, unearth hidden treasures, and unveil the island's legends. Assist the locals, tackle enthralling puzzles, dive into mini-games, and breathe life back into the island.
